full.extract:
Jeremy John Elton Lefroy (born 30 May 1959)
is a British Conservative Party politician who has been Member of Parliament (MP) for the Stafford constituency since the 2010 general election.
^ "Who's Who". Ukwhoswho.com. Retrieved 2012-10-17. 
^ "The London Gazette". London-gazette.co.uk. Retrieved 2012-10-17. 
^ "Jeremy Lefroy MP". BBC Democracy Live (BBC). Retrieved 25 July 2010.
full.title: Jeremy Lefroy
